data.text: Hi All, If you look at Gill's question versus Stef's answer of "I think so" regarding testing and sent yesterday, its not a definitive request. The transparency related to this implementation was not 100% clear. I eventually had to ask the question of whether we should be testing this with a email from Stef on the 31st (please include Gill in your testing emails as well as i might miss this). Therefore, this call was lying with me and not Gill. In general, lets please keep the requests concise and clear via Trello and not emails as per Jako's initial requests.
